text: KVLP-LP (101.5 FM) is a radio station broadcasting an Album Adult Alternative format. Licensed to Visalia, California, United States, it serves the Visalia- Tulare area. The station is currently owned by the Universal Life Church. ==See also== *List of radio stations in California ==External links== * VLP-LP VLP-LP Category:Radio stations established in 1959 Category:1959 establishments in California
title: KVLP-LP
